## Start Modelling the Stock Market

```{r echo=FALSE,fig.height=3}
library(ggplot2)

priceDF = read.csv(file = 'AAPL.csv')
priceDF$days = nrow(priceDF):1

ggplot(priceDF, aes(x=days, y=Close)) +
    geom_line() +
    labs(x='Market Days in June 2015', y='Price') +
    ggtitle(paste('Price Close for Apple'))

ggplot(priceDF, aes(x=days, y=Volume/1000000)) +
    geom_line() +
    labs(x='Market Days in June 2015', y='Volume (M)') +
    ggtitle(paste('Price Volume for Apple'))
```
